description:
The course ' Master new skills using NLP and Self Hypnosis techniques ' helps you to master new physical skills easily and effortlessly. You will be able to acquire new skills with ease in much less than your normal time. The self hypnosis and NLP techniques include affirmations , pictures etc to help you reprogram your subconscious mind to acquire new skills in your workplace , sports and in life .

This course includes-

  • Introduction to the course
  • Different stages to learning new skills
  • Self hypnosis and NLP techniques to master new skills
  • Master new skills using affirmations
  • Acquire new skills using the role model technique
  • Deep trance identification technique
  • Summary of the course
title: Master New Skills Using NLP And Self Hypnosis
